channel.title: Can Someone help me please
channel.description:
Does anyone know how 2 host a server on a Domain / Host "Website"
I have a website and i would like to use the Host and Domain to host my site if you know how PLEASE help
ill give Co-owner - Owner to who eva can help me get this done....

item.title: Can Someone help me please
item.dc:creator: @Free Free
item.description:
@Free wrote:

[quote=“Hidendra, post:3, topic:228937”][quote author=`Worx link=topic=301080.msg2416616#msg2416616 date=1220152871]

Does anyone know how 2 host a server on a Domain / Host “Website”

I have a website and i would like to use the Host and Domain to host my site if you know how PLEASE help

ill give Co-owner - Owner to who eva can help me get this done…

www.100megs.com
[/quote]
you can’t host a server on a free host, you need a vps/dedicated or your own computer…[/quote]

I know I didn’t ask the question but how would you obtain the usage of a VPS?

Read full topic
